text: Thomas Leahy (born 11 August 1964) is an Irish retired hurler who played for Kilkenny Championship club James Stephens. He played for the Kilkenny senior hurling team for a brief period, during which time he usually lined out as a forward. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:James Stephens hurlers Category:Kilkenny inter-county hurlers
title: Tom Leahy (hurler)
